description:
Professional solution for comparing and syncing database schemas

Schema Compare for MySQL is a dedicated tool that focuses on performing the comparison and synchronization jobs on the database schema versions, such as development and staging/production databases. 

This tool quickly identifies all mismatches between the schema and displays them in a neat interface with all details. It lets the users sync the database schemas automatically or manually – the Schema Compare tool produces the synchronization scripts to apply to the current schema versions or/and to save for the future. All tasks can be automated and run on schedule. 

dbForge Schema Compare for MySQL can be purchased as a separate tool, but it also is a part of the complete Database Management Studio for MySQL that includes all tools for any kind of database-related jobs.
summary: Professional solution for comparing and syncing MySQL database schemas
author: Devart
